info.description: This documentation set describes the different REST API resources of the Energyworx SaaS and the different JSON structures to be used with the individual requests.

lastSeenLatLon.description:
ProtoRPC container for GeoPt instances.

  Attributes:
    lat: Float; The latitude of the point.
    lon: Float; The longitude of the point.
